TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit GacMembershipCondition extends System.Object implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable, class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition
Public NotInheritable Class GacMembershipCondition Implements IMembershipCondition

summary.span: 通过测试程序集的全局程序集缓存成员资格，确定该程序集是否属于代码组。

span.span: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its global assembly cache membership.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在全局程序集缓存中安装的所有程序集被授予`FullTrust`权限集。All assemblies installed in the global assembly cache are granted the `FullTrust` permission set. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了利用类。The following example demonstrates the use of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 策略级别上下文进行解析命名的权限集引用。The policy level context is provided for resolution of named permission set references. 例如，代码组用于策略级别查找命名的权限集。For example, code groups use policy level to find named permission sets. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
